Articles.Content: What’s the best type of rocket to make a missile out of?

5 hours ago, MrWookie2U said:

What’s the best type of rocket to make a missile out of?

I would start with an SRB with half fuel, or more depending on distance. Have another smaller solid stage, and then a liquid fuel stage with vernier thrusters for fine control. I also recommend lots of SAS wheels

Ok. I’ll try that next. Previously I just get a rocket and angle it to face the satellite. (On ground) and let loose. 
 

sometimes I make a flurry missile by using decoupling to separate it. Love to spam them into space with Jeb in a exterior chair.   

This game makes better explosions than myth busters.
